trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Greensboro
There were no other sightings in Greensboro on or around December 15th 2001
Summary: Triangular-shape changing object, dull amber color
divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i, and a friend were waiting outside at a carrabbas restaurant ingreensboro, nc. we were sitting outside on a bench and i noticed the object tothe north.(7:20pmet) my first thought was, ok, its probably just an airliner,or a small plane. as it got closer, i felt pretty certain it wasnt a normalaircraft. the object at the distance was light amber colored\goldish yellow, very faint. it was moving ese, unknown speed. i held my hand up to it withthumb and pinky finger extened it and it move from the thumb to the finger inabout 4 seconds, not sure how fast that is, but thought you guys could give anestimate. as it came close to over head i could make out a structure,it had whatlook like a cluster of small spheres within it moving in and out,within thecraft, no noise and a very faint glow around it. i attracted a crowd of peoplearound me who also saw it, and one lady even let out a startled yelp. it movedoff to the southeast and eventually was out of view.
